definition: to strip naked/to strip nude/(coll.) to find oneself a partner
to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from
light/ray/CL:道[dao4]/bright/only/merely/to use up

sentences.english: More than 18,000 Mexicans stripped off, baring all for the sake of art.
sentences.chinese: 000餘名墨西哥人脫光衣服，爲了藝術而赤身裸體。

sentences.english: The doctor told him to strip down for a check.
sentences.chinese: 醫生讓他脫光衣服檢查身體。

sentences.english: Tied you to your bed. Terrorized you.
sentences.chinese: 他迷暈了你之後，把你衣服脫光，綁在牀上，恐嚇你。

sentences.english: He husked himself and took a hot shower.
sentences.chinese: 他脫光衣服，洗了一個熱水澡。

sentences.english: The little boy stripped off and dived into the river naked.
sentences.chinese: 小男孩脫光衣服，光着身子跳進河中。

sentences.english: She stripped the children and put them in the bath.
sentences.chinese: 她脫光孩子們的衣服把他們放進浴缸。

sentences.english: But do Jeff’s students dare to take it all off?
sentences.chinese: 但學生真的敢把衣服脫光嗎？

sentences.english: She stripped the children and put them in the bath .
sentences.chinese: 她脫光孩子們的衣服把他們放進浴缸。

sentences.english: Have them remove all their clothes and give them each a paper gown.
sentences.chinese: 衣服都脫光，每人發件紙睡衣，前面打個結就行。

sentences.english: She took off all her clothes and ran out of the washroom.
sentences.chinese: 她脫光身上的衣服，赤身裸體從洗手間跑了出來。
